title: Conflict of Interest
description: A girl whom Cody dated. runs away from her husband and goes to the boat looking for him. But they're not there but Murray is and he offers to help her. Nick and Cody are taken to her husband by his men who tells them to find her. Later when they meet, she tells them that her husband is planning to kill Quinlan. And when they tell him, he refuses to believe them.

title: Somebody's Killing the Great Geeks of America
Four-Eyes
description: The boys are hired by a guy to keep tabs on his wife. It seems he wants to divorce her and he wants ammo to avoid giving her alimony. When the man turns up dead, his wife is the prime suspect. The guys meet a couple of female private eyes who were hired by the wife to see if her husband is hiding any assets. While they're all in agreement that she didn't do it they try to find who did.

title: Mirage
description: One of Murray's students asks his help to get away from her abusive husband. He agrees to help the beautiful woman, but soon finds out she is not as innocent as she appears to be.

title: Father's Day
description: The guys are asked by a priest to help a young single mother. They eventually learn that the father is a high ranking police man who is in line to be Chief. But they also learn that he is in the pocket of a mobster, who intends to use him to keep the cops at bay but fears that if this got out, it would blow his chances to be Chief, so they are trying to get rid of her.

title: Be True to Your School
description: When Nick goes to his high school reunion, some men shoot up the place. He later learns that some of his classmates and a teacher are involved in illegal activities. And that they encroached into the territory of a criminal who was the one who shot up the reunion. And when one of them is killed, they agree to give in but one of them refuses to give in. And when they disappear, Nick sets out to find them and take them down.

title: It's a Vial Sort of Business
description: The guys are hired by a couple who are concerned that their son who was going to college dropped out and went to work in a fast food restaurant. They eventually find him and some men shoot at them. They wonder why. But they later learn it has nothing to do with the case but with Dooley.

title: Peter Pan Is Alive and Well
The Twisted Cross
description: A woman hires the guys to help her see her son whom her ex husband refuses to let her. They learn that the father is teaching his son to be a Nazi. The man runs some kind facility for boys so they need to someone in and they send Dooley. They learn that the man is planning something so they go to another group of Nazis who know the man and find out what they know.
